title: Don't You Know I'm In a Band
lyrics:
Oh I, I come alive in the dead of the night
Oh my, they like my style yeah I'm looking alright
Oh the fans try to touch my hands when I walk to the bar
But I just walk on by, ha ha ha ha ha
Don't you know I'm in a band

(Don't you know I'm in a band)

Don't you know I'm in a band



Always a place for me the VIP

The drinks are always flowing and I'm smiling cause the drugs are free

And the girls oh the girls they love me

Because they know, yeah they all know

They know I'm in a band



(Don't you know I'm in a band)

They know I'm in a band



Now watch me dance



Wham bam bam I'm a dancing man

I don't do the moves that you know I can

I don't need the money in my hand

Cause you know

Don't you know I'm in a band



(Don't you know I'm in a band)

Don't you know I'm in a band

(Don't you know I'm in a band)

Don't you know I'm in a band



Don't you know I'm in a band



Don't you know I'm in a band
